charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was invited by Nessa
to go for a swim in the ocean.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_0200: Ah, I feel so refreshed now!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_0300: I didn’t know you were such a good swimmer.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0301_0400: Do you always swim around here?
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0401_0500: Yes. The waters here are so pristine.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0402_0700: Why, I love to swim, of course!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_0800:
My father is a fisherman. Growing up, I always
lived near the ocean.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_0900:
That’s why for me, swimming is both a way to
train as well as an important source of relaxation.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0401_1100: I’ve never thought so, not even once.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0402_1300: I’ve never thought so, not even once.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1400:
It feels nice to just turn off my brain and drift
away in the water...
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1500: and swimming as hard as I can is so refreshing!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1600: Drednaw also loves to swim in the ocean.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1700:
Sometimes he’ll wake up in the wee hours of the
morning and drag me to the ocean while I’m
still half-asleep!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1800:
I try to complain and say I want to sleep more,
but every time I do, Drednaw starts to open his
mouth wide.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_1900:
When I see that, I know I’d better wake up right
away before he gives me a proper chomping!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_2000:
That aside, other than playful nibbles, he’s never
actually bitten me before.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0401_2200: Yes! Bit of a surprise, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0402_2400: He sure is! I’m glad you agree!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_2500:
Drednaw may look intimidating, but mine is
so darling!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_2600:
Sometimes, when we’re out shopping, he’ll
wander off somewhere when I’m not looking...
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_2700:
But then I call his name, and he pops his head
right up and plods back over to me!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_2800:
It’s the cutest thing I’ve ever seen! I can’t get
enough of it!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0401_3000:
You can say hi to him, but don’t get too
close, OK?
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_0402_3200:
You can say hi to him, but don’t get too
close, OK?
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3300:
My partner knows how to behave around
other people...
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3400:
But in general, Drednaw are known to be
rather aggressive.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3500:
It’s sad, but a lot of Trainers release their
Drednaw because they can’t handle them properly.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3600:
On the other hand, that means they’re extremely
loyal once you’ve earned their trust!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3700:
It might be difficult to build that trust, but once
it’s there, you can really count on them!
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3800:
That’s why I’ll keep working hard to be a Trainer
who’s worthy of my Drednaw’s trust.
charaepi_ch0249_00_rulina/2301_1201_3900:
Because I want us to be partners forever. It’s as
simple as that.
